conbody.p: We recommend using the headless browser in console mode execution for faster and more continuous releases.

ul.li: To start, generate your console mode commands by selecting either Chrome (headless) or Firefox (headless).

li.p: Click the Build CMD button on the main toolbar.

image.alt: Execute a test suite collection with headless browsers in console mode

conbody.p: To learn more about console mode execution in Katalon, you can refer to this document: Command Syntax.

li.p: Execute your tests in console mode using the generated command script from Katalon Studio.

image.alt: Execute a test suite collection with headless browsers in console mode

note.p: The headless browsers will NOT be displayed during this execution step.
